rows.heading: Attracting natural enemies!
rows.description: Insects can either have a positive or negative effect on your farm. Here are some categories of beneficial insects including flies and how to use them to protect your crops.

rows.heading: Using plant diversity
rows.description: Diversity of plants can help provide food and shelter that attract natural enemies which protect your crops. Here are ideas to try.

rows.heading: Using less toxic products
rows.description:
Homemade pesticides are safer, cheaper and a more eco-friendly way of controlling insect pests.

Here are some recipes and plants you can use:
